generation_metadata: The object is a modern sport car with a sleek aerodynamic design, featuring smooth curves and a glossy metallic finish. The 16 views include front, back, left, right, and top-down perspectives, as well as diagonally oriented angles from above and below. Each view maintains consistent lighting with soft, even illumination from all sides to avoid harsh shadows. Scale and positioning are uniform across all views, ensuring the car is centered and occupies a similar proportion of each frame. The background is a pure white, providing high contrast with the object for easy segmentation during 3D reconstruction. Material properties of the car include glossy paint, transparent windows, metallic rims, and rubber tires.
image_prompt: A set of sixteen digital photographs arranged in a 4x4 grid featuring a sport car captured from different angles. Each sub-image shows the sport car from a distinct viewpoint: front, back, left, right, top, bottom, and various oblique angles. The sport car is centered in each view, with consistent lighting, scale, and positioning. The background is pure white with no shadows or other objects, suitable for 3D reconstruction.
description: The generated image will consist of 16 views of a sport car, arranged in a 4x4 grid. Each sub-image presents the car from a unique angle, ensuring comprehensive coverage for 3D reconstruction. The uniform lighting and white background facilitate easy extraction of the car's silhouette and features, aiding in accurate modeling.

evaluation_results.suggestions_for_improvement: Improve lighting consistency and add more diverse angles
evaluation_results.metadata_suggestions: Include more specific angle descriptions and lighting details

previous_iteration_metadata: Include more specific angle descriptions and lighting details
